Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time elapsed from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to lead to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to any subsequent 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time until 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' until 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in the variant with the highest frequency
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to lead to a change in manuscript status (e.g., from 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers')
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' cycle from sending to receiving a response (either 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or 'SW-Reviewer Declined')
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' in the context of leading to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in cases leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in cases resulting in 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined' across all variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
